title: Dubinik® Flannel Shirt for Men 100% Cotton Mens Flannel Shirts Long Sleeve Plaid Soft Casual Button Down Shirt Men
description: 【True to size】Dubinik mens flannel shirt are sized to fit US measurements. If you're not sure about what size to get, just check the size chart based on your regular clothing size. And if you like a looser fit, feel free to go up one size.

【Washing advice】Mens flannel are pre-shrunk during production and will not shrink; Machine washable or hand washable; Not fade or deform. If you have any questions, please feel free to click on the store [Dubinik] to contact us.

【Fabric】This long sleeve shirts for men is made of 100% cotton, soft,lightweight, comfortable, and warm. Classic plaid design, button down collar and regular fit make this mens flannel shirts classic that won't go out of style, easy to match and good fabric is durable. Each of our mens long sleeve button down shirts goes through a strict quality inspection process before shipping, so you don't need to worry about product breakage, buttons falling off, or pilling after use.

【Design】Dubinik mens button up shirts long sleeve have durable construction and regular fit. Button-down collar, adjustable cuffs, and a chest pocket for easy storage. Available in a variety of colors. Button down shirt men can be worn with jackets or as office shirts in winter, fall and spring. Mens plaid shirt are available in different colors: green,red ,yellow,blue,grey, black, khaki, brown, purple, and white.

【Suitable occasions】Mens button down long sleeve shirts suitable a variety of occasion: Daily,Casual,Business,Work,Party,Holidays,Vacation. Dubinik mens long sleeve shirt is an ideal gift for Christmas, Father's Day, holiday,etc.
